scenario_text.value:
Is that s-so...
Haha, kinda awkward, no?
Hehe...
What’s with you two?

Ah, Takuma! And Agumon!
Lopmon and I were just chatting.

You know, I think Shuuji and me are both
really alike in some ways.
Really? Like how?

Well, when I find myself admiring the sky,
he’ll walk up to me and say how pretty it is.

Or when I slip and fall somewhere and get all
muddy, it’ll happen to him in the same spot.
Ahaha, wow, that’s really funny!

Those types of things have indeed happened
on multiple occasions...

He’s also so nice and works hard. But he’s
not perfect. He has stuff he’s bad at, too.

He tries to hide it, but it only blows up in
his face. I could go on and on.

Wow, that’s really interesting you two are
somehow so similar.

Can I ask you something, Takuma? How do you
really feel about us?
What do you mean how I feel? In what sense?
I just wonder what humans think of us.

I’m curious as well.
What do you think of Agumon and Lopmon?
What do I think? Um...

(Agumon’s a trusted ally that fights at
my side.)

(No, it’s more than that. It’s hard to
describe... Like we’re similar somehow.)

(But lately I’ve been finding it kind of
frightening...)
(For me, they are...)
Allies in battle.
Like us in all ways.
Kinda scary, maybe.

I personally think of you guys as friends and
comrades we fight alongside.

Are you saying that because of your current
situation?

That’s part of it, but I’ve started to think
there’s more to it than that.
Oh? How so?

Lopmon said that you’re alike even in terms
of the bad parts, too, right?

I’ve realized that there are some parts of me
that are like that.
Really?

Yeah, even me. And it’s because of Agumon
here that I’ve been able to recognize that.

That’s why I hope that by sticking together,
we can both lift each other up, I guess.

That sounds so cheesy to say out loud,
though.
Aww, Takuma!
I totally understand what you mean, though.

I think you guys are a lot like us, for both
better and for worse.
You think so too, Takuma?

Yeah. The more I think about it, the more it
feels like that’s the only honest answer.
Huh? What’s that supposed to mean?

Ahaha, it might be best for you to not think
about it too much if you can help it.

I don’t get it! Now you’re just saying weird
stuff!

Maybe we should all try not to think too
much about it...

When it comes to relationships, thinking
doesn’t change much, anyway.
So it’s best not to think about it at all?

No matter what you think about our bond, we
will continue supporting each other, no?
Yeah! That’s right!

Honestly, I think I might be a little scared
of you guys.
Why are you scared of us?

Because even among our enemies, there are
creatures like you and Agumon, right?

When I start to wonder why we can’t get along
with them, I get scared...

And it’s because I don’t get why that is when
we’re supposed to be on the same team.
Takuma...

I get it. They’re the same, so you’re scared
of the fact that we’re not getting along.

Our maybe it’s better to say that this is the
problem we’re all confronting now.

Human and Kemonogami... I don’t think it’s
impossible to understand each other, but...
